module.p: cluinn hear is an irregular verb.
Is e gnìomhair neo-riaghailteach a tha ann an cluinn.

The principal parts of cluinn are –
cluinnidh – future independent ie. will hear
chuala – past independent ie. heard
cluinntinn – verbal noun ie. hearing
